findings.liver: Mildly diffusely echogenic; smooth contour; no focal liver mass; main portal vein patent with hepatopetal flow; no ascites.
findings.bile_ducts: No intrahepatic biliary dilation; CHD measures 8 mm.
findings.gallbladder: Several stones noted without gallbladder-wall thickening or edema; no pericholecystic fluid.
findings.pancreas: Not well visualized, largely obscured by overlying bowel gas.
findings.spleen: Normal echogenicity, upper limits of normal in size measuring 12 cm.
findings.retroperitoneum: Visualized portions of aorta and IVC are within normal limits.
